backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing e-commerce functionality with access control, including product management (admin-only), cart operations (user-only), order processing, and user profile management using blob storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features (home page with categories, product listing with filtering, add-to-cart functionality, cart page with quantity controls, and checkout page) with high confidence and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the React application structure with TanStack Router, pages for home/products/cart/checkout/admin, reusable components, React Query hooks for backend integration, and green-themed styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color tokens, using white background and green primary colors for the HD Providers brand.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and title 'HD Providers', loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, products, cart, checkout, order confirmation, and admin pages, wrapped in a layout with navigation, footer with caffeine.ai attribution, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying a shield alert icon and message for unauthorized users attempting to access admin areas, with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Cart item component displaying product details with quantity adjustment controls (plus/minus buttons), remove button, and subtotal calculation using React Query mutations for cart updates.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCard.tsx: Reusable category card component with icon, image, colored background, and hover effects that triggers an onClick callback for navigation.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation bar component with links to Home, Products, Cart (with item count badge), and conditionally-rendered Admin link for admin users.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component displaying product image, name, category, price, and an 'Add to Cart' button with loading state.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form component for adding or editing products with fields for name, price, category, and image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with admin token from URL params.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Hook that queries whether the current caller has admin privileges using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Hooks for cart operations including fetching cart summary, adding items, updating quantities, removing items, and checkout with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for fetching individual orders by ID and retrieving all orders for the current user.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Hooks for product operations including fetching all products, filtering by category, adding new products, and updating existing products.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a green-themed color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page that checks admin authorization, displays a product list in a table, and provides UI to add/edit products via ProductForm component.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with CartItem components, shows order summary with total, and provides checkout navigation or empty cart state.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that displays order summary, allows payment method selection (COD or UPI), and handles order placement with navigation to order confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying HD Providers branding with four category cards (Vegetables, Dairy, Groceries, Food) that navigate to filtered product listings.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Order confirmation page that displays order details including ID, payment method, status, items, and total with navigation options to home or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Products listing page with category filter tabs that displays products in a grid, supports adding items to cart, and handles category-based filtering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system with CSS variables, container settings, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting HD Providers app requirements including home delivery features (categories, cart, checkout with COD/UPI QR), admin panel, architectural notes about no authentication initially, and tracking of existing and planned features with their requirement IDs.
